articles.title: West Zone ride on Pujara century to inch towards Duleep final - Rediff.com
articles.description: Pujara went into lunch on 92 and hardly wasted any time to reach the landmark upon his return. Pujara hammered Saurabh for a couple of fours, one through the cover and one behind the point fielder, to complete his hundred.
